page.title: 16BENTHAM PANTOMIME
page.content: In 1981 the first pantomime (Cinderella) was produced by John Hicks. It starred Alison Hawkey, Keith Cowling and Kevin McSherry. So great was it's success that others followed. Puss in Boots (1982), Aladdin (1983), Snow White (1984) and Peter Pan (1985). The latter two shows were written by the cast. The pantos came from the driving force of Heather Guy and Jillian Taylor who revived a past tradition of live performances. The group has excellent scenery created by Edna Watt and Brian Cowling also lively and relevant music devised by Zosia Koc. It is thought that the future may see this evolve into other spheres such as several small productions or one more complex effort.
